00075 
00076 inline G4bool 
00077 BDSSynchrotronRadiation::IsApplicable(const G4ParticleDefinition& particle)
00078 {
00079   return(  (&particle == G4Electron::Electron())
00080            ||(&particle == G4Positron::Positron()) );
00081 }
00082 
00083 inline G4double 
00084 BDSSynchrotronRadiation::GetMeanFreePath(const G4Track& track,
00085                                         G4double PreviousStepSize,
00086                                         G4ForceCondition* ForceCondition)
00087 {  
00088   *ForceCondition = NotForced ;
00089 
00090   //   static G4FieldManager* lastFieldManager;
00091 
00092   G4double MeanFreePath;
00093   G4FieldManager* TheFieldManager=
00094     track.GetVolume()->GetLogicalVolume()->GetFieldManager();
00095 
00096   if(track.GetTotalEnergy()<BDSGlobals->GetThresholdCutCharged())
00097         return DBL_MAX;
00098 
00099   if(TheFieldManager)
00100     {
00101       const G4Field* pField = TheFieldManager->GetDetectorField() ;
00102       G4ThreeVector  globPosition = track.GetPosition() ;
00103       G4double  globPosVec[3], FieldValueVec[3] ;
00104       globPosVec[0] = globPosition.x() ;
00105       globPosVec[1] = globPosition.y() ;
00106       globPosVec[2] = globPosition.z() ;
00107       
00108       if(pField)
00109         pField->GetFieldValue( globPosVec, FieldValueVec ) ; 
00110         
00111       G4double Blocal= FieldValueVec[1];
00112       if ( FieldValueVec[0]!=0.)
00113         Blocal=sqrt(Blocal*Blocal+FieldValueVec[0]*FieldValueVec[0]);
00114 
00115       
00116  
00117       if(track.GetMaterial()==theMaterials->LCVacuum&&Blocal !=0 )
00118         {
00119           /*
00120             if(lastFieldManager!=TheFieldManager)
00121             {
00122              
00123             lastFieldManager=TheFieldManager;
00124             
00125             G4MagInt_Driver* MagDriver=         
00126             TheFieldManager->GetChordFinder()-> GetIntegrationDriver();
00127             
00128             G4FieldTrack fTrack=G4FieldTrack
00129             (track.GetPosition(),track.GetMomentumDirection(),
00130             1,track.GetKineticEnergy(),0.511*MeV,track.GetVelocity());
00131             
00132             G4cout<<" before R="<< BDSLocalRadiusOfCurvature<<G4endl;
00133             G4double dydx[6];
00134             G4double dchord_step;
00135              G4double dyerr;
00136              
00137              MagDriver->QuickAdvance(       
00138              fTrack,         // INOUT
00139              dydx ,  
00140              1.e-10*m,       // In
00141              dchord_step,
00142              dyerr )  ;
00143              
00144              G4cout<<" after R="<< BDSLocalRadiusOfCurvature<<G4endl;
00145              
00146              //    MeanFreePath=1.e-10*m;
00147              //  BDSLocalRadiusOfCurvature=DBL_MAX;
00148              MeanFreePath=
00149              abs(BDSLocalRadiusOfCurvature)/(track.GetTotalEnergy()*nExpConst);
00150              }
00151              else
00152              {
00153           */
00154           G4ThreeVector InitMag=track.GetMomentum();
00155           G4double Rlocal=(InitMag.z()/GeV)/(0.299792458 * Blocal/tesla) *m;
00156           
00157           MeanFreePath=
00158             abs(Rlocal)/(track.GetTotalEnergy()*nExpConst);
00159           
00160           //      G4cout<<"Rlocal="<<Rlocal/m<<" BDSR="<<BDSLocalRadiusOfCurvature/m
00161           //<<G4endl;
00162            //       MeanFreePath=
00163            //abs(BDSLocalRadiusOfCurvature)/(track.GetTotalEnergy()*nExpConst);
00164            // }
00165            
00166            // tmp 
00167            //MeanFreePath=DBL_MAX;
00168 
00169           //      G4cout<<"Blocal="<<Blocal/tesla<<"  Rlocal="<<Rlocal/m<<G4endl;
00170           //      G4cout<<track.GetVolume()->GetName()<<" mfp="<<MeanFreePath/m<<G4endl;
00171           return MeanFreePath;
00172         }
00173       else
00174         return DBL_MAX;
00175     }
00176   else
00177     return DBL_MAX;
00178   
00179 }
